name: Sam Ferguson Design
description: I've been passionate about art and design from an early age, so when I realized I could use these skills to make a living I knew that this was the job for me. Following my graduation from the University of Cumbria in 2008 I began my freelance design career as Sam Ferguson Design. Since then I have worked with many businesses, helping them to build their brand and develop a strong web presence. I specialize in helping small businesses become local household names.
